DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , dose-ranging phase 2b study investigate hepatic renal safety tolerability multiple dose administration two dose level CSL112 compare placebo subject acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2b Study CSL112 Subjects With Acute Myocardial Infarction .
DOC.criteria: Men woman , least 18 year age , evidence myocardial necrosis clinical setting consistent type I ( spontaneous ) acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) , last week . Ongoing hemodynamic instability Evidence hepatobiliary disease Evidence chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) ( Stage III , IV , V ) , define moderate severe renal impairment subject receive dialysis Evidence unstable renal function History acute kidney injury previous exposure intravenous contrast agent . Known history allergy , hypersensitivity deficiency CSL112 components Other severe comorbid condition , concurrent medication , issue render subject unsuitable participation study
